page.title: 12My home in Chailey
page.content: I live on a farm and we have a very busy life we have 117 sheep, 8 cows some ducks, chickens, dogs, cats, geese and a pony. I have two brothers and twice a year we dip the sheep. Every sheep has to be dipped by law against scab and flystrike. Twice a year we also have to shear them. You start off at the rear of the sheep and work up its tummy until you get to its head then you turn the sheep over and start on its back. once they are shorn you have told fold the flece in a special way and then it is put into a sack and sent to be sold.
